ColoredRune = object
  rune*: Rune
  styling* {.requiresinit.}: PrintStyling

ColorTextConvertible = string | char | Rune | ColoredText | ColoredRuneLine |
    ColoredLine |
    ColoredString
  Source   Edit 
PrintStyling = object
  case use8Bit*: bool
  of true:
      fg8*: TermColor8Bit
      bg8*: TermColor8Bit

  of false:
      fg*: ForegroundColor
      bg*: BackgroundColor

  style*: set[Style]
  Source   Edit

Consts

coloredWhitespaceRune: ColoredRune = (rune: 32, styling: (use8Bit: false,
    fg8: tcBlack, bg8: tcBlack, fg: fgDefault, bg: bgDefault, style: {}))
